reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Project supporting the protection of minors victim of violation of human rights

description.narrative: L'iniziativa si prefigge di accompagnare i Paesi partner nell'elaborazione e nello sviluppo di politiche e programmi nazionali a favore dei diritti dell'infanzia, di promuovere servizi di protezione per bambini vittime di abuso e accompagnamento nelle famiglie di origine per i bambini vittime di tratta e di sviluppare una strategia regionale per la tutela dei minori, in ambito ECOWAS

The project aims at supporting the Countries of intervention with respect to children rights “de jure” and “de facto” through the development of an integrated system for the protection and promotion of children rights at national and local level. The initiative aims at promoting a strategic partnership between UN, the Ministries of Justice and Family and CSOs in order to facilitate the legislative reforms and support the ECOWAS in elaborating a strategy of promotion and protection of children rights according to the SDGs, the CRC and CEDAW

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
